tooltip.mekaweapons.magnetizer: Charges your inventory items with energy from the selected frequency. Also displays the Meka-Bow and Meka-Tana on your back (when equipped on Curios).
description.mekaweapons.arrowenergy_unit: Fire arrows made of pure energy. Removes the need for ammunition.
description.mekaweapons.autofire_unit: Fires automatically when the Meka-Bow is fully charged.
description.mekaweapons.drawspeed_unit: Increases the draw speed of the Meka-Bow.
description.mekaweapons.gravitydampener_: Defy gravity with the power of Antimatter. Full charged shots go straight to the target.
description.mekaweapons.arrowvelocity_un: Multiply the velocity of the arrows.
description.mekaweapons.attackamplificat: Amplifies weapon's damage on players or mobs.
description.mekaweapons.sweeping_unit: Enables sweeping attacks with the Meka-Tana.
description.mekaweapons.looting_unit: Cause mobs to drop more items and increase the chances of rare drops when using Meka-Weapons.
